TEXT.TITLE: SOUTHERN NATIONAL CORP <SNAT> SETS STOCK SPLIT
TEXT.BODY: Southern National corp said its board declared a three-for-two stock split, payable to shareholders of record on May 22. A company spokeswoman said the payable date for the split has not yet been fixed but would be shortly after the record date. Reuter
